text: Er Jia is a very cosy pub with very good karaoke system. The pub is decorated with underwater theme. Very nice!!! Do come visit when you are around the vicinity.

Just went there yesterday and it was good! A good place to hang out with your friends or loves one! Looking forward after 12/12 as the boss told us that we can sing songs too! Super cosy place to chill out!!!

Drop by with friends to check out this new pub. Cosy environment with friendly pretty staffs. Mostly office people and working adults chilling out. We are ordered Martell and beer and is not expensive. Great place to chill and catch up with friends.
Just went there yesterday to celebrate my birthday.There is a good place to hang out with your friends. There can also request songs and sing there.Nice place！
Sound system is good to sing & the environment so comfortable, really have fun. Been there for 3rd times
